mapper.update: update admin set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, touxiang = #{touxiang,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, phone, userName, password, touxiang from admin
